## Pull request overview

This PR implements comprehensive filtering and sorting capabilities for the Machines list page, following a hybrid server-side approach with in-memory filtering. The implementation generalizes the existing `useSearchFilters` hook to support both Issues and Machines with type safety.

**Changes:**
- Adds search by machine name or initials with exact match priority for initials
- Adds multi-select filters for machine status (operational, needs_service, unplayable) and owner
- Adds 8 sort options including name, status, open issues count, and date added
- Generalizes the `useSearchFilters` hook to work with both IssueFilters and MachineFilters using TypeScript generics
